summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1918, for the improvement of the alley in Block Fifty-six (56) of Terry's First Addition to the City of Seattle, by grading the same and constructing all necessary concrete retaining walls and a wooden curb and gutter on the west side of the alley; under Ordinance No. 19789, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
